ComicInfo.Title: The Mystery of the Wraith!
ComicInfo.Summary: The Mystery of the Wraith!: Spider-Man asks for Dr. Strange's help in investigating Brian DeWolff's death. Phillip reveals how he's been able to mentally control Brian, using him as the Wraith.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:45:23. [Issue ID 30329]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority

ComicInfo.Penciller: Gil Kane,Sal Buscema,Dave Hunt,Sal Buscema,Dave Hunt
ComicInfo.Letterer: Irving Watanabe,Gaspar Saladino,Karen Mantlo,Gaspar Saladino,Karen Mantlo
